instructions.name: buy_exact_in
docs: Use the given amount of quote tokens to purchase base tokens.
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `amount_in` - Amount of quote token to purchase
* `minimum_amount_out` - Minimum amount of base token to receive (slippage protection)
* `share_fee_rate` - Fee rate for the share

accounts.name: payer
docs: The user performing the swap operation
Must sign the transaction and pay for fees

accounts.name: authority
docs: PDA that acts as the authority for pool vault operations
Generated using AUTH_SEED

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account containing protocol-wide settings
Used to read protocol fee rates and curve type

accounts.name: platform_config
docs: Platform configuration account containing platform-wide settings
Used to read platform fee rate

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account where the swap will be performed
Contains current pool parameters and balances

accounts.name: user_base_token
docs: The user's token account for base tokens (tokens being bought)
Will receive the output tokens after the swap

accounts.name: user_quote_token
docs: The user's token account for quote tokens (tokens being sold)
Will be debited for the input amount

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: The pool's vault for base tokens
Will be debited to send tokens to the user

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: The pool's vault for quote tokens
Will receive the input tokens from the user

accounts.name: base_token_mint
docs: The mint of the base token
Used for transfer fee calculations if applicable

accounts.name: quote_token_mint
docs: The mint of the quote token

accounts.name: base_token_program
docs: SPL Token program for base token transfers

accounts.name: quote_token_program
docs: SPL Token program for quote token transfers

instructions.name: buy_exact_out
docs: Use quote tokens to purchase the given amount of base tokens.
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `amount_out` - Amount of base token to receive
* `maximum_amount_in` - Maximum amount of quote token to purchase (slippage protection)
* `share_fee_rate` - Fee rate for the share

accounts.name: payer
docs: The user performing the swap operation
Must sign the transaction and pay for fees

accounts.name: authority
docs: PDA that acts as the authority for pool vault operations
Generated using AUTH_SEED

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account containing protocol-wide settings
Used to read protocol fee rates and curve type

accounts.name: platform_config
docs: Platform configuration account containing platform-wide settings
Used to read platform fee rate

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account where the swap will be performed
Contains current pool parameters and balances

accounts.name: user_base_token
docs: The user's token account for base tokens (tokens being bought)
Will receive the output tokens after the swap

accounts.name: user_quote_token
docs: The user's token account for quote tokens (tokens being sold)
Will be debited for the input amount

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: The pool's vault for base tokens
Will be debited to send tokens to the user

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: The pool's vault for quote tokens
Will receive the input tokens from the user

accounts.name: base_token_mint
docs: The mint of the base token
Used for transfer fee calculations if applicable

accounts.name: quote_token_mint
docs: The mint of the quote token

accounts.name: base_token_program
docs: SPL Token program for base token transfers

accounts.name: quote_token_program
docs: SPL Token program for quote token transfers

instructions.name: claim_vested_token

docs: The beneficiary of the vesting account

docs: PDA that acts as the authority for pool vault and mint operations
Generated using AUTH_SEED

docs: Account that stores the pool's state and parameters
PDA generated using POOL_SEED and both token mints

accounts.name: vesting_record
docs: The vesting record account

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: The pool's vault for base tokens
Will be debited to send tokens to the user

accounts.name: base_token_mint
docs: The mint for the base token (token being sold)
Created in this instruction with specified decimals

docs: SPL Token program for the base token
Must be the standard Token program

docs: Required for account creation

docs: Required for associated token program

instructions.name: collect_fee
docs: Collects accumulated fees from the pool

docs: Only protocol_fee_owner saved in global_config can collect protocol fee now

docs: Pool state stores accumulated protocol fee amount

accounts.name: global_config

docs: The address that holds pool tokens for quote token

docs: The mint of quote token vault

docs: The address that receives the collected quote token fees

docs: SPL program for input token transfers

accounts.name: owner
docs: Only migrate_fee_owner saved in global_config can collect migrate fee now

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Pool state stores accumulated protocol fee amount

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global config account stores owner

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for quote token

accounts.name: quote_mint

docs: The address that receives the collected quote token fees

instructions.name: create_config
docs: Creates a new configuration
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The accounts needed by instruction
* `curve_type` - The type of bonding curve (0: ConstantProduct)
* `index` - The index of config, there may be multiple config with the same curve type.
* `trade_fee_rate` - Trade fee rate, must be less than RATE_DENOMINATOR_VALUE

accounts.name: owner
docs: The protocol owner/admin account
Must match the predefined admin address
Has authority to create and modify protocol configurations

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account that stores protocol-wide settings
PDA generated using GLOBAL_CONFIG_SEED, quote token mint, and curve type
Stores fee rates and protocol parameters

accounts.name: quote_token_mint
docs: The mint address of the quote token (token used for buying)
This will be the standard token used for all pools with this config

accounts.name: protocol_fee_owner
docs: Account that will receive protocol fees

accounts.name: migrate_fee_owner
docs: Account that will receive migrate fees

accounts.name: migrate_to_amm_wallet
docs: The control wallet address for migrating to amm

accounts.name: migrate_to_cpswap_wallet
docs: The control wallet address for migrating to cpswap

accounts.name: system_program
docs: Required for account creation

instructions.name: create_platform_config
docs: Create platform config account
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
# Fields
* `fee_rate` - Fee rate of the platform
* `name` - Name of the platform
* `web` - Website of the platform
* `img` - Image link of the platform

accounts.name: platform_admin
docs: The account paying for the initialization costs

accounts.name: platform_config
docs: The platform config account

accounts.name: system_program
docs: Required for account creation

instructions.name: create_vesting_account
docs: Create vesting account
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `share` - The share amount of base token to be vested

accounts.name: creator
docs: The account paying for the initialization costs
This can be any account with sufficient SOL to cover the transaction

accounts.name: beneficiary
docs: The beneficiary is used to receive the allocated linear release of tokens.
Once this account is set, it cannot be modified, so please ensure the validity of this account,
otherwise, the unlocked tokens will not be claimable.

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The pool state account

accounts.name: vesting_record
docs: The vesting record account

accounts.name: system_program
docs: Required for account creation

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initializes a new trading pool
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts containing pool and token information

accounts.name: payer
docs: The account paying for the initialization costs
This can be any account with sufficient SOL to cover the transaction

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account containing protocol-wide settings
Includes settings like quote token mint and fee parameters

accounts.name: platform_config
docs: Platform configuration account containing platform info
Includes settings like the fee_rate, name, web, img of the platform

accounts.name: authority
docs: PDA that acts as the authority for pool vault and mint operations
Generated using AUTH_SEED

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Account that stores the pool's state and parameters
PDA generated using POOL_SEED and both token mints

accounts.name: base_mint
docs: The mint for the base token (token being sold)
Created in this instruction with specified decimals

accounts.name: quote_mint
docs: The mint for the quote token (token used to buy)
Must match the quote_mint specified in global config

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: Token account that holds the pool's base tokens
PDA generated using POOL_VAULT_SEED

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: Token account that holds the pool's quote tokens
PDA generated using POOL_VAULT_SEED

accounts.name: metadata_account
docs: Account to store the base token's metadata
Created using Metaplex metadata program

accounts.name: base_token_program
docs: SPL Token program for the base token
Must be the standard Token program

accounts.name: quote_token_program
docs: SPL Token program for the quote token

accounts.name: metadata_program
docs: Metaplex Token Metadata program
Used to create metadata for the base token

accounts.name: system_program
docs: Required for account creation

accounts.name: rent_program
docs: Required for rent exempt calculations

instructions.name: migrate_to_amm
docs: # Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts

accounts.name: payer
docs: Only migrate_to_amm_wallet can migrate to cpswap pool
This signer must match the migrate_to_amm_wallet saved in global_config

docs: The mint for the base token (token being sold)

accounts.name: quote_mint
docs: The mint for the quote token (token used to buy)

accounts.name: market
docs: Account created and asigned to openbook_program but not been initialized

accounts.name: request_queue
docs: Account created and asigned to openbook_program but not been initialized

accounts.name: event_queue
docs: Account created and asigned to openbook_program but not been initialized

accounts.name: bids
docs: Account created and asigned to openbook_program but not been initialized

accounts.name: asks
docs: Account created and asigned to openbook_program but not been initialized

accounts.name: market_quote_vault
docs: Token account that holds the market's quote tokens

Generated using AUTH_SEED

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Account that stores the pool's state and parameters
PDA generated using POOL_SEED and both token mints

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global config account stores owner

accounts.name: base_vault
docs: The pool's vault for base tokens
Will be fully drained during migration

accounts.name: quote_vault
docs: The pool's vault for quote tokens
Will be fully drained during migration

docs: SPL Token program for the base token
Must be the standard Token program

docs: Required for account creation

docs: Required for rent exempt calculations

instructions.name: migrate_to_cpswap
docs: # Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts

accounts.name: payer
docs: Only migrate_to_cpswap_wallet can migrate to cpswap pool
This signer must match the migrate_to_cpswap_wallet saved in global_config

accounts.name: base_mint
docs: The mint for the base token (token being sold)

accounts.name: quote_mint
docs: The mint for the quote token (token used to buy)

accounts.name: platform_config
docs: Platform configuration account containing platform-wide settings
Used to read platform fee rate

accounts.name: cpswap_pool
docs: PDA account:
seeds = [
b"pool",
cpswap_config.key().as_ref(),
token_0_mint.key().as_ref(),
token_1_mint.key().as_ref(),
seeds::program = cpswap_program,
Or random account: must be signed by cli

docs: The pool's vault for base tokens

- 1: Update fee owner

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Input account owner is not the program address

errors.name: InputNotMatchCurveConfig
errors.msg: The input params are not match with curve type in config

errors.name: InvalidPlatformInfo
errors.msg: The platform info input is invalid

errors.name: InvalidCpSwapConfig
errors.msg: The input cp swap config account is invalid

types.name: AmmCreatorFeeOn
docs: migrate to cpmm, creator fee on quote token or both token

fields.name: migrate_type
docs: Migrate to AMM or CpSwap, 0: amm 1: cpswap
Neither 0 nor 1: invalid

fields.name: migrate_cpmm_fee_on
docs: The migrate fee on, 0 means fee on the quote token, 1 means fee on both token
Neither 0 nor 1: invalid

fields.name: supply
docs: The supply of the token,
0: invalid

fields.name: total_base_sell
docs: The total base sell of the token
0: invalid

fields.name: total_quote_fund_raising
docs: The total quote fund raising of the token
0: invalid

fields.name: total_locked_amount
docs: total amount of tokens to be unlocked
u64::MAX: invalid

fields.name: cliff_period
docs: Waiting time in seconds before unlocking after fundraising ends
u64::MAX: invalid

fields.name: unlock_period
docs: Unlocking period in seconds
u64::MAX: invalid

types.name: ClaimVestedEvent
docs: Emitted when vesting token claimed by beneficiary

types.name: CreateVestingEvent
docs: Emitted when vest_account created

types.name: GlobalConfig
docs: Holds the current owner of the factory

fields.name: epoch
docs: Account update epoch

fields.name: curve_type
docs: 0: Constant Product Curve
1: Fixed Price Curve
2: Linear Price Curve

fields.name: index
docs: Config index

fields.name: migrate_fee
docs: The fee of migrate to amm

fields.name: trade_fee_rate
docs: The trade fee rate, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: max_share_fee_rate
docs: The maximum share fee rate, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: min_base_supply
docs: The minimum base supply, the value without decimals

fields.name: max_lock_rate
docs: The maximum lock rate, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: min_base_sell_rate
docs: The minimum base sell rate, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: min_base_migrate_rate
docs: The minimum base migrate rate, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: min_quote_fund_raising
docs: The minimum quote fund raising, the value with decimals

fields.name: quote_mint
docs: Mint information for quote token

fields.name: protocol_fee_owner
docs: Protocol Fee owner

fields.name: migrate_fee_owner
docs: Migrate Fee owner

fields.name: migrate_to_amm_wallet
docs: Migrate to amm control wallet

fields.name: migrate_to_cpswap_wallet
docs: Migrate to cpswap wallet

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

types.name: MigrateNftInfo
docs: Represents the parameters for initializing a platform config account(Only support MigrateType::CPSWAP)
# Fields
* `platform_scale` - Scale of the platform liquidity quantity rights will be converted into NFT
* `creator_scale` - Scale of the token creator liquidity quantity rights will be converted into NFT
* `burn_scale` - Scale of liquidity directly to burn
* platform_scale + creator_scale + burn_scale = RATE_DENOMINATOR_VALUE

types.name: MintParams
docs: Represents the parameters for initializing a new token mint
# Fields
* `decimals` - Number of decimal places for the token
* `name` - Name of the token
* `symbol` - Symbol/ticker of the token
* `uri` - URI pointing to token metadata

fields.name: epoch
docs: The epoch for update interval

fields.name: platform_fee_wallet
docs: The platform fee wallet

fields.name: platform_nft_wallet
docs: The platform nft wallet to receive the platform NFT after migration if platform_scale is not 0(Only support MigrateType::CPSWAP)

fields.name: platform_scale
docs: Scale of the platform liquidity quantity rights will be converted into NFT(Only support MigrateType::CPSWAP)

fields.name: creator_scale
docs: Scale of the token creator liquidity quantity rights will be converted into NFT(Only support MigrateType::CPSWAP)

fields.name: burn_scale
docs: Scale of liquidity directly to burn

fields.name: fee_rate
docs: The platform fee rate

fields.name: name
docs: The platform name

fields.name: web
docs: The platform website

fields.name: img
docs: The platform img link

fields.name: cpswap_config
docs: The platform specifies the trade fee rate after migration to cp swap

fields.name: creator_fee_rate
docs: Creator fee rate

fields.name: transfer_fee_extension_auth
docs: If the base token belongs to token2022, then you can choose to support the transferfeeConfig extension, which includes permissions such as `transfer_fee_config_authority`` and `withdraw_withheld_authority`.
When initializing mint, `withdraw_withheld_authority` and `transfer_fee_config_authority` both belongs to the contract.
Once the token is migrated to AMM, the authorities will be reset to this value

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

fields.name: curve_params
docs: The parameters for launching the pool

fields.name: epoch
docs: The epoch for update interval, 0 means not update

fields.name: index
docs: The curve params index

fields.name: global_config
docs: The global config address

fields.name: bonding_curve_param
docs: bonding curve param

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

types.name: PlatformParams
docs: Represents the parameters for initializing a platform config account
# Fields
* `migrate_nft_info` - The platform configures liquidity info during migration(Only support MigrateType::CPSWAP)
* `fee_rate` - Fee rate of the platform
* `name` - Name of the platform
* `web` - Website of the platform
* `img` - Image link of the platform
/// * `creator_fee_rate` - The fee rate charged by the creator for each transaction.

types.name: PoolCreateEvent
docs: Emitted when pool created

types.name: PoolState
docs: Represents the state of a trading pool in the protocol
Stores all essential information about pool balances, fees, and configuration

fields.name: epoch
docs: Account update epoch

fields.name: auth_bump
docs: Bump seed used for PDA address derivation

fields.name: status
docs: Current status of the pool
* 0: Pool is funding
* 1: Pool funding is end, waiting for migration
* 2: Pool migration is done

fields.name: base_decimals
docs: Decimals of the pool base token

fields.name: quote_decimals
docs: Decimals of the pool quote token

fields.name: migrate_type
docs: Migrate to AMM or CpSwap, 0: amm 1: cpswap

fields.name: supply
docs: Supply of the pool base token

fields.name: total_base_sell
docs: Total sell amount of the base token

fields.name: virtual_base
docs: For different curves, virtual_base and virtual_quote have different meanings
For constant product curve, virtual_base and virtual_quote are virtual liquidity, virtual_quote/virtual_base is the initial price
For linear price curve, virtual_base is the price slope parameter a, virtual_quote has no effect
For fixed price curve, virtual_quote/virtual_base is the initial price

fields.name: real_base
docs: Actual base token amount in the pool
Represents the real tokens available for trading

fields.name: real_quote
docs: Actual quote token amount in the pool
Represents the real tokens available for trading

fields.name: total_quote_fund_raising
docs: The total quote fund raising of the pool

fields.name: quote_protocol_fee
docs: Accumulated trading fees in quote tokens
Can be collected by the protocol fee owner

fields.name: platform_fee
docs: Accumulated platform fees in quote tokens
Can be collected by the platform wallet stored in platform config

fields.name: migrate_fee
docs: The fee of migrate to amm

fields.name: vesting_schedule
docs: Vesting schedule for the base token

fields.name: global_config
docs: Public key of the global configuration account
Contains protocol-wide settings this pool adheres to

fields.name: platform_config
docs: Public key of the platform configuration account
Contains platform-wide settings this pool adheres to

fields.name: base_mint
docs: Public key of the base mint address

fields.name: quote_mint
docs: Public key of the quote mint address

fields.name: base_vault
docs: Public key of the base token vault
Holds the actual base tokens owned by the pool

fields.name: quote_vault
docs: Public key of the quote token vault
Holds the actual quote tokens owned by the pool

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator of base token

fields.name: token_program_flag
docs: token program bits
bit0: base token program flag
0: spl_token_program
1: token_program_2022
bit1: quote token program flag
0: spl_token_program
1: token_program_2022

fields.name: amm_creator_fee_on
docs: migrate to cpmm, creator fee on quote token or both token

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

types.name: PoolStatus
docs: Represents the different states a pool can be in
* Fund - Initial state where pool is accepting funds
* Migrate - Pool funding has ended and waiting for migration
* Trade - Pool migration is complete and amm trading is enabled

types.name: TradeDirection
docs: Specifies the direction of a trade in the bonding curve
This is important because curves can treat tokens differently through weights or offsets

types.name: TradeEvent
docs: Emitted when trade process

fields.name: transfer_fee_basis_points
docs: denominator is 10000, currently, this value cannot exceed 5%, which is 500.

fields.name: maximum_fee
docs: Maximum fee on each transfers, the value must exceed supply * transfer_fee_basis_points / 10000

fields.name: epoch
docs: Account update epoch

fields.name: pool
docs: The pool state account

fields.name: beneficiary
docs: The beneficiary of the vesting account

fields.name: claimed_amount
docs: The amount of tokens claimed

fields.name: token_share_amount
docs: The share amount of the token to be vested

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

fields.name: allocated_share_amount
docs: Total allocated share amount of the base token, not greater than total_locked_amount
